lead_paragraph: A former Venezuelan military intelligence head detained on the Caribbean island of Aruba over U.S accusations of drug-trafficking was released and flew home on Sunday.

headline.main: Aruba Frees Venezuela Ex-General Sought by U.S. Over Drugs
headline.print_headline: Aruba Frees Venezuela Ex-General Sought by U.S. Over Drugs

snippet: A former Venezuelan military intelligence head detained on the Caribbean island of Aruba over U.S accusations of drug-trafficking was released and flew home on Sunday....
